attributes.action: The Right to Protest without License
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has long been noted that to our current government policies, that to protest in the UK we need to be issued authorisation on the topic of our chosen petition, & should it be passed (if) we are only then given a license to protest. We would like this to no longer be the case, it IS a breach of our Human Rights after all.

rejection.details: Please reword the main sentence to give an action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
